channel.title: Projects on Justus
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Justus

item.title: Movies watched
item.description: As a guy who loves to watch different movies and tv shows I created this static website do display the movies that i have watched over the years. The website shows basic stats like the movie name, release date and a poster image. I also added to show the rating of what i though about that specific movie. This data is received using the TMDB (the movie database) apikey. My watched movies

item.title: Christmas preparations
item.description: I created a simple website with some cool tools to help manage christmas To the website

item.title: Iron Man: arc reactor
item.description: I’m a very big Marvel fan myself. My favorites are doctor strange and Iron Man. One day I watched a youtube video and it showed how to build Iron man’s arc reactor using a 3d printer. I downloaded the file and immediately got excited about the project. To original video! In the first step, I actually started by printing the body of the arc reactor. Next I had to get an EL panel for my project.

item.title: Tetris on browser
item.description: I made Tetris game for the browser as the final project in my programming course Linkki tetrikseen
